Mammal predictions

Source: R/mammal_predict.R
dot-mammal_predicts.Rd

Function for calculating the species level predictions for mammals

Usage

.mammal_predicts(
  species,
  taxon = NULL,
  veg = NULL,
  soil = NULL,
  climate = NULL,
  boot = 0,
  modified = FALSE
)

Arguments

species

Unique Species ID.

taxon

Taxon associated with the unique Species ID.

veg

Matrix of standardized vegetation information (row sum equals 1). If NULL and model is available, no prediction is generated.

soil

Matrix of standardized soil information (row sum equals 1). If NULL and model is available, no prediction is generated.

climate

Matrix of the bioclimatic variables that is matched to the vegetation and/or soil matrices.

boot

Defines bootstrap iteration to generate the predictions from.
